algorithm_technique: Greedy approach using available time increments.
problem_summary_simple: Find minimum operations to change current time to correct time using specific increments.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates the time difference in minutes and greedily applies the largest possible time increments (60, 15, 5, 1) to minimize operations.
key_insights: Convert both times to minutes for easier calculation.
A greedy approach works because the available increments are fixed and ordered.
Prioritize larger increments to reduce the total number of operations.
